name: Bulletproof UI (Based on Tailwind CSS)
description:
BETA RELEASE


A design system and collection of best practices based on Tailwind CSS framework.


Please leave your feedback!


Beta Release v0.2

  • Added new Tailwind colors
  • Added breakpoint grids
  • Added box-shadows, drop-shadows, blur, backdrop-blur


Beta Release v0.1

  • Button component (nested method)
  • Tailwind CSS Colors + 3 extra colors
  • Tailwind CSS Text Styles
  • Customized Tailwind CSS shadows
  • Icon recommendation
